infobox.Japanese title:: ノブナガ四五〇事件  (Nobunaga Yongōmaru Jiken)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ai Haibara  Detective Boys  Hiroshi Agasa  Tamekichi Matsushiro
infobox.Animation director:: Masatomo Sudo and Seiji Muta (Supervisors)  Keiko Sasaki
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Akiko Motoyoshi and Kyoko Yoshimi (sub-character)  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Kenichi Ogata as Hiroshi Agasa  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima  Makoto Furukawa as Kengo Akahoshi  Daisuke Kirii as Teppei Aoto  Takahiro Miwa as Koji Midoriyama  Masayasu Nagata as Takuro Kurotani  Natsuko Hara as Kurumi Momochi  Hitoshi Horimoto as Tamekichi Matsushiro  Kimiyoshi Kibe as Iwao Tobayama  Asami Yoshida as Boy  Masato Kokubun as Newscaster  Kenji Nomura as Kimifusa Oyabu

sections.Trivia:
- Starting from this episode, Nobuyuki Iwai is not credited as character design.
- The names of Nobuna Gaizer show actors come from the colors they represent: Kengo Akahoshi (Red), Teppei Aoto (Blue), Koji Midoriyama (Green), Takuro Kurotani (Black), Kurumi Momochi (Peach).
- The Nobuna Gaizer show was the parody of Super Sentai series.
- The Nobuna Gaizer van is a 2001 White Mazda Bongo Friendee [SG].
